item.title: Report E-2025010367
item.description:
Report E-2025010367

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-10T06:19:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-18
  • City: DUANESBURG
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: L.P. TRANSPORTATION, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Driver stated he had finished unloading, closed all valves including the trailer's internal valve and disconnected the unloading hose. While attempting to replace the protective cap on the outlet fitting, the Driver states he either slipped and reached out for something(valve) to "catch " himself or the cap's safety chain(cable) became draped over the valve handle and when he pulled the cap the valve opened slightly. Residual product exited the outlet contacting the driver in the mid section. There was no failure of packaging, valves or equipment.

item.title: Report X-2025020220
item.description:
Report X-2025020220

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-31
  • City: FARMINGVILLE
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO BAY 14 FOR A SPILL. WAS TOLD IT WAS A HAZMAT "FLAMMABLE GAS". RESPONDER DONNED APPRON, BOOTS, GOGGLES, AND GLOVES AND HEADED TO THE SPILL. WHEN ARRIVING RESPONDER SAW THE PACKAGE AND PLACED IT IN A LINED TUB TO BE BROUGHT BACK FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report I-2025020002
item.description:
Report I-2025020002

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-28
  • City: Long Island City
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 01/28/2025 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL Express LLC facility, located at 12-12 33rd Avenue, Long Island City, NY 11106. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Shipment also contains UN1950 Aerosols, non-flammable UN1266 Perfumery products Class 2.2 Class 3 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Receptacle Packaging Type: Bottle' Material of Construction: Metal Material of Construction: Glass Package Capacity: 177 mL i Package Capacity 100 mL Amount in Package: 177 mL Amount in Package: 100 mL Number in Shipment 1 Number in Shipment 3 Number Failed: 1 Number Failed: 3
